top_comments.comment: Watching this video while wearing, Chelsea boots, ripped jeans and a flannel
My advice to my fellow brothers: never follow trends just to fit in
Tbh an overcoat and a turtle neck and a necklace it’s one of the best outfits I’ve ever worn in my life you should 100% try it
I'm 39, what I heard was...ok it's over stop dressing how we used to dress in the 90s and now dress how you did in the 2000s 🤣
Joggers have been played out since 2017.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Me, who gets all my clothes from ross and Walmart.. "cool, cant believe guys or anyone wastes their time on thinking what to wear" 😂
Flannels are never out of style
Watching this video while wearing, Chelsea boots, ripped jeans and a flannel
